jsl.observers
Interface ObserverIfc

All Known Implementing Classes:
AcrossReplicationHalfWidthChecker, AcrossReplicationRelativePrecisionChecker, AnimationObserverAbstract, BatchingElement.AddRemoveObserver, BatchingElement.RBatchStatisticObserver, BatchingElement.TWBatchStatisticObserver, CounterObserver, CSVExperimentReport, CSVReplicationReport, CSVReport, ExecutiveTraceReport, ExperimentConsoleObserver, IPLogReport, LogReport, ModelActionObserver, ModelElementObserver, MoveableElementAnimationObserver, Mover2DObserver, MReplicationReport, MSummaryReport, ReplicationConsoleObserver, ResourceAnimationObserver, StatisticalReport, STSStatisicalObserver, TestObserverableObserver.Observer, VariableAnimationObserver, VariableTraceTextReport
public interface ObserverIfc

The Java implementation of the observer/observable pattern has a number of flaws. This interface works with observers as a call back function for when the observable needs observing

Method Summary
 void update(java.lang.Object theObserved, java.lang.Object arg)
          This method is called when the observable needs observing
